Fall_River.Bishop Connolly High School:
Bishop Connolly High School is a co-educational Catholic high school in Fall River, Massachusetts.


== Campus and building ==
Connolly's campus is approximately 60 acres (240,000 m2). The campus is adjacent to Bristol Community College and B.M.C Durfee High School, Fall River's public high school is located directly across Elsbree Street.
